title: Efficacy of Lipid-based Nutrient Supplements (LNS) for Pregnant and Lactating Women and Their Infants

operands.value: No more than 20 wk of gestation
Given Ante-natal Cards of the Ghana Health Service
Completed the initial routine ante-natal examination at the clinics
HIV negative (as from the Ante-natal card)
HIV status unknown (as from the Ante-natal card)
Free from chronic disease e.g. malignancy requiring frequent medical attention (as from the Ante-natal card)
Residing in the Manya Krobo or Yilo Krobo district
Prepared to sign an informed consent
Living in the area throughout the duration of the study
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Known asthmatic or history of allergy towards peanut or milk products
Concurrent participation in another clinical trial

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('Acceptance of home visitors'), Symbol('At least 18 years of age'), Symbol('Completed the initial routine ante-natal examination at the clinics'), Symbol('Free from chronic disease e.g. malignancy requiring frequent medical attention (as from the Ante-natal card)'), Symbol('Given Ante-natal Cards of the Ghana Health Service'), Symbol('Living in the area throughout the duration of the study'), Symbol('Must be FEMALE'), Symbol('Must have minimum age of 18 Years'), Symbol('No more than 20 wk of gestation'), Symbol('Prepared to sign an informed consent'), Symbol('Residing in the Manya Krobo or Yilo Krobo district'), Or(Symbol('HIV negative (as from the Ante-natal card)'), Symbol('HIV status unknown (as from the Ante-natal card)')), Not(Or(Symbol('Concurrent participation in another clinical trial'), Symbol('Known asthmatic or history of allergy towards peanut or milk products'), Symbol('Severe illness warranting hospital referral'))))
